message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10500. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. However, $10500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. If you can't accept that, I'll have to go with another seller.
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $10000, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $10750. What do you think?
